game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is threatened by an ancient evil known as the Time Reavers. Players take on the role of a temporal guardian tasked with repairing the timestream and defeating the Time Reavers in a battle across different eras.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player's character discovering their ability to manipulate time, only to be met with a catastrophic event that shatters the timeline. Guided by a mysterious ally known as the Chronos, the player must navigate through the fragmented timestream to uncover the source of the destruction.
game.ending: Ultimately, the player faces off against the mastermind behind the Time Reavers: an entity from outside the timestream known as the Devourer. With time itself hanging in the balance, the player's decisions will determine whether the world is restored to its former glory or forever lost to the void.
